imdb.title: Uma Musume: Pretty Derby
imdb.plot: Horse girl Special Week has moved from the country to the city to attend Tracen Academy. There, she and her classmates compete to win the Twinkle Series and earn the title of "The County's #1 Horse Girl."

episodes.title: Tokai Teio
episodes.plot: All eyes are on Tokai Teio as she takes on the Japanese Derby, ready to gallop in Symboli Rudolf's footsteps and become an undefeated Triple Crown Horse Girl.

episodes.title: Never Gonna Give It Up!
episodes.plot: The Japanese Derby is over, and Tokai Teio's injuries have landed her in rehabilitation. She's determined to recover by the Kikkashou, the last race she needs for the Triple Crown.

episodes.title: Meetings
episodes.plot: Team Spica goes for their first shrine visit of the year. After praying for victory, Tokai Teio resolves herself to face rival Mejiro McQueen in the upcoming Spring Tennoushou.

episodes.title: TM Showdown!
episodes.plot: In preparation for the Spring Tennoushou, Tokai Teio joins the spectators at another race, the Satsukishou. Meanwhile, Mejiro McQueen cannot hide her frustration upon learning that the world has its money on Tokai Teio.

episodes.title: Unbeaten Champion
episodes.plot: After many trials and tribulations, it's finally time for Team Spica to race in the Spring Tennoushou.

episodes.title: Searching for a Reason
episodes.plot: After tasting her first defeat, Tokai Teio is listless for days. Her trainer approaches her and tells her that there is a place she must visit.

episodes.title: A Blessed Name
episodes.plot: Seeking three consecutive victories at the Spring Tennoushou, Mejiro McQueen's focus is interrupted by the sudden withdrawal of Rice Shower, another top racer. Intuiting Mejiro McQueen's feelings on the matter, Tokai Teio tries to persuade Rice Shower to change her mind.

episodes.title: A Small Wish
episodes.plot: Realizing that she has no hope for victory at this rate, Rice Shower disappears right before the race is set to begin.

episodes.title: Stopwatch
episodes.plot: Tokai Teio is supposed to be focused on making her comeback in the Takarazuka Kinen, but ends up fracturing a bone for the third time. The doctor tells her that even after it heals, there's a chance she'll never get her old speed back again.

episodes.title: One Day Without a Doubt
episodes.plot: No longer able to run at full speed, Tokai Teio realizes that she'll never win again. Left with no reason to race, she plans to withdraw from Team Spica, but her trainer asks her to put on one last show for her fans.

episodes.title: What I Feel
episodes.plot: Tokai Teio trains to race once more, having had a change of heart. She thanks almost everyone who helped her through her ordeal, but finds herself struggling to be honest with Mejiro McQueen.

episodes.title: Together
episodes.plot: As Tokai Teio continues to train in preparation for her return to racing, Mejiro McQueen notices something strange.

episodes.title: Galloping After Our Dreams
episodes.plot: The Arima Kinen is the final G1 race of the year, featuring a roster of horse girls selected by fan ballot. Tokai Teio is among the competitors, and this time, she is running with something to prove.

episodes.title: Gate of Dreams!
episodes.plot: Special Week wants to become Japan's best horse girl and has transferred into Tracen Academy. She sees her first race, and has her heart stolen by Silence Suzuka.

episodes.title: The Debut Race out of Nowhere
episodes.plot: Special Week is told she has only a week to prepare for her debut race. Symboli Rudolf, the student council president, and Silence Suzuka try to help her prepare.

episodes.title: First Big Win
episodes.plot: The members of Team Spica win their races which impresses their trainer. However, he points out that they do not perform well in their Winning Concerts. To practice for their Winning Concerts, the trainer organizes a karaoke session with Tokai Teio to train the team on singing and dancing.

episodes.title: Special Training!
episodes.plot: Still reeling from the loss in the Satsuki Shou, Special Week finds out that she has gained weight. To gain muscle, Special Week goes on special training with the other members of Team Spica.

episodes.title: The Derby With Rivals
episodes.plot: Special Week, El Condor Pasa and Seiun Sky train and prepare for the Japanese Derby.

episodes.title: Autumn Skies and Horse Girls
episodes.plot: Team Spica has more members, and now they're enjoying the Fall Twinkle Series Fan Appreciation Fair.

episodes.title: Promise
episodes.plot: Team Spica is training to take down Rigil. Special Week realizes she really wants to race with Silence Suzuka, and decides to talk to her trainer about it.

episodes.title: For You
episodes.plot: Silence Suzuka recovers in a hospital before undergoing rehabilitation to run again.

episodes.title: Dreams of Spica
episodes.plot: Spica's trainer plans a summer training camp for the members to help get them get in even better shape.

episodes.title: No Matter How Many Times I Lose
episodes.plot: Special Week is working hard to keep her promise, but her trainer wants her to rest instead, and has her go back home temporarily.

episodes.title: Welcome Back!
episodes.plot: Silence Suzuka prepares for the Open Special, her comeback race. At the same time, Broye comes to Japan, where she declares that she will race in the Japan Cup against Special Week.

episodes.title: Stage of Dreams
episodes.plot: Special Week's mother comes to Japan to watch her in the Japan Cup. Special Week, preparing herself for the race, meets her friends who give her the motivation to win the Japan Cup.

episodes.title: Echo, Fanfare!
episodes.plot: Eighteen horse girls will compete in the Winter Dream Trophy.
